message_1: A company has recorded the sales quantity (in units) and price (in dollars) of its products for the past 10 days. Use data mining techniques to find out the average price of the product and the highest sales quantity recorded in a single day.
message_2: To find the average price of the product and the highest sales quantity recorded in a single day, we need the data for the past 10 days. Please provide the sales quantity and price data for the past 10 days.
